ALTLABELS:
JS Development
JavaScript Coding
ECMAScript Programming
DESCRIPTION: Programming in JavaScript language for web applications, both client-side and server-side development. Includes modern ES6+ features, frameworks and libraries.
DEFINITION: Ability to write, execute and debug JavaScript code for creating interactive web applications and server-side solutions.
SCOPENOTE: Covers vanilla JavaScript, React, Angular, Vue.js, Node.js and modern development practices including async/await, promises and modules.

ALTLABELS:
Statistical Analysis
Data Mining
Business Intelligence
DESCRIPTION: Analyzing datasets to identify patterns, trends and insights that inform business decisions. Using statistical methods and analytical tools to process information.
DEFINITION: Capability to examine, interpret and draw conclusions from data using various analytical techniques and software tools.
SCOPENOTE: Includes descriptive analytics, predictive modeling, data visualization and reporting. Covers tools like Excel, R, Python, SQL and Tableau.

ALTLABELS:
UI Design
Interface Design
Visual Design
DESCRIPTION: Creating visually appealing and functional interfaces for digital products. Designing layouts, typography, color schemes and interactive elements.
DEFINITION: Ability to design user interfaces that are both aesthetically pleasing and functionally effective for optimal user experience.
SCOPENOTE: Encompasses wireframing, prototyping, design systems and visual hierarchy. Includes proficiency with design tools like Figma, Adobe XD and Sketch.

ALTLABELS:
Team Coordination
Task Management
Resource Planning
DESCRIPTION: Coordinating project activities, resources and team members to ensure successful project delivery within scope, time and budget constraints.
DEFINITION: Ability to organize, plan and oversee project elements while facilitating communication and collaboration among stakeholders.
SCOPENOTE: Includes project planning, risk management, stakeholder communication and progress tracking. Covers methodologies like Agile, Scrum, Kanban and traditional project management.

ALTLABELS:
Cloud Infrastructure
Cloud Services
Cloud Architecture
DESCRIPTION: Working with cloud-based computing services and infrastructure to deploy, scale and manage applications and data storage solutions.
DEFINITION: Knowledge of cloud platforms, services and best practices for designing and implementing cloud-based solutions.
SCOPENOTE: Encompasses Infrastructure as a Service, Platform as a Service and Software as a Service. Includes AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, containerization and serverless computing.

DESCRIPTION: Understanding and applying machine learning algorithms and techniques to create predictive models and intelligent systems.
DEFINITION: Theoretical and practical knowledge of machine learning concepts, algorithms and their implementation for solving complex problems.
SCOPENOTE: Includes supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, natural language processing, computer vision and model evaluation techniques.

DESCRIPTION: Managing database systems including design, implementation, maintenance and optimization of data storage and retrieval processes.
DEFINITION: Ability to work with relational and non-relational databases ensuring data integrity, security and optimal performance.
SCOPENOTE: Covers SQL, NoSQL, database design, normalization, indexing, backup procedures and database security. Includes MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB and Redis.

DESCRIPTION: Using version control systems to track changes in code, collaborate with team members and manage software development workflows.
DEFINITION: Proficiency in using version control tools to maintain code history, enable collaboration and manage software releases.
SCOPENOTE: Encompasses Git workflows, branching strategies, merge conflict resolution and collaborative development practices. Includes platforms like GitHub, GitLab and Bitbucket.
